channel.title: Um.. i am noob and i dont know a little bit of codeing .. i need help
channel.description: :(i am a aryan user and i have my own offline server but when i try to edit the config like add a new npc :( or how to make magic or ranged work .... by the way you have to help me using a notepad config file text. ty if anyone can help.. ps can someone plz tell me how to add npc's and make them talk :| :o :o :o :o :o :o

item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“dog eats dog, post:14, topic:155307”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=212019.msg1853535#msg1853535 date=1193653911]

Ha, Nun the less, You have been on longer then me even if you have been a MITB Fag, Ive been on 4 days, 6 hours and 19 minutes

Lets see, I started coming here on moparscape at… 4pm yesterday, it is now 4pm that next day. I go to bed at 9:30 every night. And I have been home from school 40 minutes. So, 6 hours and 40 minutes I have been at mpscp.

Bullcrap, 5 days ago you was on these forums, And you haven’t left since.

Mind telling me where I posted 5 days ago?
I have made a few posts here and there, only flaming noobs. =]
[/quote]

Well if your just flaming noobs, How did you get the 82 rep? Looks like someone has 100+ rep friends.[/quote]
I meant I just flamed noobs when I didn’t post here on a regular bases. Now, I enjoy this forum, so I post here quite often.

Read full topic
